title: 1-on-1 Remote Tech Training
headline: Learn securely and confidently at your pace.
description: Get personalized, one-on-one technology training through private Zoom sessions. We help individuals of all ages build confidence with digital tools. From basic skills to secure habits.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Interactive, live training helps people retain knowledge and avoid common mistakes better than videos or self-guided tutorials.
Frustration with technology often comes from skipped steps or one-size-fits-all solutions. Personalized instruction focuses on what matters to you.
Simple missteps with devices or accounts are responsible for many privacy issues. A little training can go a long way in keeping you safe.

sections.heading: Popular Topics
items: Basic computer use, file organization, and safe web browsing
Windows, macOS, and smartphone navigation and settings
Email, cloud storage, and backup setup
Password managers, two-factor authentication, and account security
Cybersecurity for everyday users; how to stay safe online
Online shopping, banking, and scam detection
Digital hygiene and privacy for families, seniors, and beginners

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: Sessions are held over Zoom with clear, step-by-step instruction tailored to your pace and goals.
We work with individuals, couples, and families. No technical background required.
There is no software to install, and no support plan is required. All you need is an internet connection and a willingness to learn.
